About

I'm a UX designer from Lagos, Nigeria - currently working at Booking.com in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

Most of my work revolves around creating and rethinking digital experiences. My skillset includes; User Interface Design, Web Development, Rapid Prototyping, and User Research.

I have a background in graphic design, architecture and urban planning.

Some years ago, I worked at a design agency where I had the privilege of building awesome products and working with top clients from around the world.

I've also tried and sucked at launching a successful startup.

I'm currently unavailable for work, but if you just want to chat, you can contact me.




EXPERIENCE
  • Booking.com 2017 - Present
  • Konga.com 2015 - 2017
  • Andela 2014 - 2015
  • Prowork 2011 - 2014
  • Freelance 2008 - 2011
SPEAKING
  • Usable UX Meetup — November 2016

    I gave a talk on the process of building payment solutions for Nigeria - http://techcabal.com/2016/11/22/usable-meetup-at-cchub-on-thursday

  • KongaPay Developer Conference - July 2016

    My team organized a conference for developers using our platform. I gave a talk on the process of building the KongaPay product, and how to use the web payment interface and SDKs - https://attending.io/events/k-con16

  • UX Lagos Meetup — March 2016

    I was part of a panel that gave a talk on the state of design in Nigeria, user experience, design process, problem-solving and introduction for new designers. - http://attending.io/events/uxlagos-meetup-march-2016
